footer.Questions or concerns: Questions or concerns? Just fill out the form and our support team will get back to you within 24 hours.

home.Choose the service: Choose the service you want us to help with
home.about-1: ARI Technology Joint Stock Company was established in 2018 and headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City.
home.about-2: We specialize in consulting and delivering digital transformation solutions to address real-world problems, help customers to overcome their business challenges to achieve the highest business operations efficiency.
home.about-3: With a team of young and creative talents, ARI always aims at the most innovative and top-notch quality products, ensuring that those products will satisfy the customer’s needs.
home.A right choice: A right choice that makes the difference to others
home.ARI not only strives: ARI not only strives to become one of the leading technology companies of Industrial Revolution 4.0 in Vietnam, but also a reliable outsourcing company that provides high-quality software development services at a competitive price.
home.We love: “We love integrating technology into our daily life, making a more comfortable and relaxing life.”
